structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. RIGHT-OF-WAY PLAN AND MINIMUM WIDTH

text.section:
Sec. 33-137. Measuring setback lines.
All building and structure setbacks from roads, streets, highways, etc., as prescribed elsewhere in this chapter, shall be measured from the official right-of-way line adjacent to the property (where full dedication has not been made) and where dedication is greater than the minimum required, the setback for buildings and structures shall be measured from the dedicated line.
